name: grippingly
content:

in a way that is so interesting or exciting that it holds your attention completely: The story is grippingly told. This study of self-deception is a grippingly good read. Related word
gripping
More examplesFewer examplesThe story is told, grippingly, through the eyes of the two men.His story is grippingly dramatized in the film.He writes grippingly in his memoir of his grief during this period.The performance was grippingly dramatic.Her writing is elegant and grippingly journalistic.I found her novels so grippingly intense that it was impossible to put them down.The match is likely to be grippingly tense.
